mapper.select: SELECT b.num, replace(b.title,#{searchValue},'${searchValue}') title,b.writer, b.title,replace(b.writer,#{searchValue},'${searchValue}') writer, b.title,b.writer, b.title,b.writer, b.title,b.writer, b.imgn,b.hit,b.reip,b.bdate, COUNT(c.ucode) as cnt FROM ( SELECT a.*, ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY num DESC) as r_num FROM upboard a title like '%'|| #{searchValue} ||'%' writer like '%'|| #{searchValue} ||'%' content like '%'|| #{searchValue} ||'%' ) b left JOIN upboard_comm c ON b.num = c.ucode WHERE b.r_num BETWEEN #{begin} AND #{end} GROUP BY b.num, b.title, b.writer, b.imgn, b.hit, b.reip, b.bdate order by b.num desc

title like '%'||#{searchValue}||'%'
